text: The Buick Envista is a compact Coup√© Crossover SUV made by Buick since 2022. == History and Features == The Buick Envista was first shown in China in August 2022. later it was launched in North America in April 2023. the Envista is made in Changwon while for the Chinese market its made in Shenyang the SUV shares its plataform with the Chevrolet Trax and has a 1.2 liter turbo and 1.5 liter turbo (avaliable in China only) gasoline engines with a 6-speed automatic transmission and a CVT transmission (also avaliable in China only). == Markets == The Buick Envista is currently sold in North America and China in North America its the entry-level model of Buick brand and is positioned above the Buick Encore GX and below the Buick Envision. == References == Envista Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Buick Envista
